title: AE脚本-高科技电流电路板线路动画 circuitFX v1.91 含使用教程
author: 大众脸
content: circuitFX 是 AE 软件中一款高科技电流电路板线路动画脚本，能够随机生成各种电路图。脚本支持创建芯片、电阻、电容器等元件，并可将这些部件统一放置于一个图层或分别独立控制，操作简单直接。适用于制作HUD高科技背景动画、科技类视觉特效及其他科幻风格项目。该脚本在不同版本的 After Effects 中均兼容，特别适合用于动态科技视觉设计。

other.update_notes: 修复：在“Using Masks”模式下无法生成电路的问题
other.english_description: circuitFX is a tool for After Effects designed to create graphical circuit boards. The circuit pattern is generated randomly with every button press. Apart from the circuit lines and circles, circuitFX also creates chips, resistors and capacitors. It has the ability to put all of the needed parts in a single shape layer or create separate shape layers for each part of the board. It is ideal for technology or sci-fi related projects, animated backgrounds, HUDs etc.
